metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24684 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise 0.9.0 through 1.0.16, 1.1.11, and 1.2.5 allow operators with job-submit capabilities to use the spread stanza to panic server agents. Fixed in 1.0.18, 1.1.12, and 1.2.6.

criterions.comment: nomad: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
